original_text: And they beat down the cities, and on every good piece of land cast every man his stone, and filled it; and they stopped all the wells of water, and felled all the good trees: only in Kirharaseth left they the stones thereof; howbeit the slingers went about it, and smote it.
korean_text: 그 성읍들을 쳐서 헐고 각기 돌을 던져 모든 좋은 밭에 가득하게 하고 모든 샘을 메우고 모든 좋은 나무를 베고 길하레셋의 돌들은 남기고 물매꾼이 두루 다니며 치니라

sentences.original_text: and on every good piece of land cast every man his stone,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 좋은 땅에 각 사람이 자기 돌을 던져

sentences.original_text: and they stopped all the wells of water,
and felled all the good trees:
only in Kirharaseth left they the stones thereof;
